description:
This DLC includes the following items:
 
①Milky Way--A legendary weapon exclusive to the Farmer. 
Equip Milky Way to obtain the following effects: "Increased Runes Gained", "Increased Crit", and "Increased Max HP".

②Voidstone--A rare Magistone.
Set it in a weapon slot to obtain the following effect: "Increased Stun Resistance".
name: Farmer's Special Weapon & Voidstone Set
